name: On Black Midnight Tee
description: A classic black t-shirt with a subtle yet stylish logo on the chest. The 'On Black' brand is a nod to its deep, rich color. Made with a comfortable, cotton-like material, this tee is a versatile addition to any wardrobe. The back features a bold QR code and a statement of its Cameroonian origin. Be comfortable with On Black.
attributes: Cotton-like, classic fit, round neck, black color, white and black logo on the chest, tag with a QR code, 'WARNING' tag on the bottom right corner, 'ON BLACK ORIGINALS MADE IN CAMEROON' and a QR code on the back.

name: On Black Cargo CAWE Grey Pant | The Cloud Surfer
description: Float through life in the  Cloud Surfer  Grey Cargos! These wide-leg wonders are crafted for ultimate chill with that effortlessly  baggy, parachute vibe . Featuring adjustable drawstrings for a custom scrunch/ruched look—wear them long and flowing or cinch them up for an adventure-ready fit.  Max comfort, zero effort chic.
attributes: Wide parachute fit, ruched adjustable drawstrings, lightweight fabric, elastic waist.

name: On Black Cargo CAWE Pant | Dual Tone Drape Dynasty
description: Why choose one when you can have both? Dive into the  Drape Dynasty ! These are the ultimate  streetwear shapeshifters  in both earthy brown/tan and sleek grey. Rock the  parachute silhouette  with those signature scrunch details and adjustable ties. Perfect for a look that transitions seamlessly from 'lounge-ninja' to 'festival-ready explorer'.  Your vibe, your adjustments!
attributes: Oversized, baggy fit, versatile two-tone pack, dramatic scrunch details, adjustable length/ruching.

name: On Black Cargo CAWE Grey Pant | Gravity Defier Edition
description: Meet the  Gravity Defier  Grey Pant! These aren't just cargos; they're a fashion statement. The  effortless, wide drape  paired with functional side drawstrings lets you play with volume and length. Get that sought-after  scrunchy, gathered texture  in a cool, neutral grey. Ideal for those who believe comfort shouldn't sacrifice cutting-edge style.  Unbox your next flex.
attributes: Extra-wide leg, cinching side ties, lightweight nylon-style fabric, distinctive brand logo hits.
